ygData.msgSnippet: I don t know, let s go back there, now. Sinister said to Blizzard. Airbomber watched Stranato running around and calling out. He laughed. Stranato better

"I don't know, let's go back there, now." Sinister said to Blizzard.

Airbo=
mber watched Stranato running around and calling out. He laughed.

"Stranat=
o better get some help, otherwise be might become a 'heel' again." Airbombe=
r said. He smiled and hugged Infectra, he never felt this way about a girl =
before....
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  To: n=
bwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 4:38 AM
  Subject: Re: N=
BW


  Twister/Blizzard/Infectra



  *Twister looks at the sword and sighs=
*

  Twister: I'll have to get used to the fact that, my sister has a life =
too and I'll have to learn to travel alone....

  *Twister sighs and slowly=
 and gentley places the energon eagles into her arm compartment*


  *Blizz=
ard looks at Sinister and smiles*

  Blizzard: I wonder what's happening ba=
ck at the base.



  *Infectra smiles back at Airbomber*

  Infectra: I tru=
st the both of you......I did trust the others but....

  *Infectra sighs*
=

  Infectra: I need to stop thinking of things that upset me. But, it's har=
d to thinl of the good times because there were hardly none.

  *Infectra s=
ays to Airbomber and grins*


    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: T=
HECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 4:20 =
AM
    Subject: Re: NBW


    Sinesis frowns. He holds up his brothers swor=
d.

    "He left this here, without it, what shall he do? We have simular p=
roblems. I just wish I still had him by my side." Sinesis said to Twister.
=

    Sinister held Blizzards hand, illegal fireworks shooting off in his ey=
es.

    Stranato calls out.

    "Hey, any Maximals here?" He yells throug=
h the base. Airbomber sits down and looks to Infectra. He smiles.

    "Hop=
efully, the Maximals will listen to us, they must know of the occurences ha=
ppening. I trust Stranato, he's always been good. Well, maybe he hasn't alw=
ays been good, but he's good now." Airbomber said to Infectra. He laughed a=
t his words...
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: iloveallliza=
rds 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Thursday, August 03, 2000 11=
:44 PM
      Subject: Re: NBW


      Twister/Blizzard/Infectra



      *T=
wister looks at Sinesis*

      Twister: I've decided to let my sister be..=
.For she's my sister and I love her too much to pull her away from the she =
loves....

      *Twister opens her arm compartment and pulls out a two sma=
ll pieces of energon both shaped like an eagle*

      Twister: Our parents=
 gave us both one to unite us as sisters and friends forever and always hel=
p each other. I found Blizzard's on the ground in front of the base. I doub=
t she dropped it by accident.....

      *Twister holds out to Sinesis so h=
e can see*



      (OOC: Ack! I meant The Team Ultima Base! My bad, Sorry.=
)

      *Blizzard skips out of the cave and walks next to Sinister for The=
 Team Ultima Base and holds her hand out wanting Sinister to hold her hand*=




      *Infectra follows Stranato and Airbomber into the Maximal Base*

=

        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: THECODE 
        To: n=
bwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Thursday, August 03, 2000 6:59 PM
        =
Subject: Re: NBW


        Sinesis sighs and stares at Twister. (Sorry abou=
t earlier.)

        Sinister frowns when he sees Blizar walking toward the=
 Maximal base.

        "Where are you going? And can I come?" Sinister ask=
ed.

        Stranato and Airbomber stop at the Maximal base, since they we=
re never set on enemy and never betrayed the Maximals, they went on in...
 =
         ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: ilovealllizards 
   =
       To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Thursday, August 03, 2000 6:=
46 PM
          Subject: Re: NBW


          Infectra/Wrath/Blizzard/Twiste=
r


          *Infectra follows Stranato and Airbomber towards the Maximal =
Base*



          *Wrath gets into a CR Chamber when he arives at the Maxi=
mal Base awaits his repairs*



          *Blizzard does a little skip out =
of the cave walks next to Sinister for the Maximal Base and holds her hand =
out towards his wanting to hold hands with him*



          (OOC: Twister =
is out near the Maximal Base but I'm making her come back anyway.)

       =
   *Twister leaves the location of the Maximal Base seeing as how everyone =
was else where and went back to Team Ultimas Base and sits at the same tabl=
e as Sinesis*

          Twister: I don't know what I'm going to do....I en=
d up here thinking I'll find a nice Team where I'm wanted and me and my sis=
ter could be sisters and friends...I was such a fool for believing such hap=
piness could happen.....

          *Twister puts her double sided sword aw=
ay stares at the table*


            ----- Original Message ----- 
       =
     From: THECODE 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: T=
hursday, August 03, 2000 6:27 PM
            Subject: NBW


            Str=
anato and Airbomber walked toward the Maximal base.

            Gangon, st=
ill dying.

            Deemos and Inzola confront one another several time=
s, but Inzola always runs from Deemos.

            Etchingar called out to=
 Megatron.

            "Hey, do I got the job?" He asked.

            Tim=
e Bomb waited patiently and Land Mine was healed now. Land Mine looked arou=
nd, looking to meet Megatron.

            Sinister came out of the cave (H=
opefully with Blizzard.) and started back toward Team Ultima's base.

     =
       Sinesis was healed and sat down next to Twister...
